content.text:
# Draft:All about the presidents nefew;maya hamdoun

-----
Maya Sia Hamdoun (born in London, England) is known for her achievements in various sporting events, including skating.
Her mother, Amina Osseili, is related to the current president of Liberia, Joseph Boakai. Her father was born in Sierra Leone with one parent from Lebanon, and her mother was born in Liberia with one parent from Lebanon.
At the age of seven, Hamdoun won the 'best skater of Lewisham' award and has won several skating competitions. She was rewarded with a MacBook Pro by her uncle, Joseph Boakai, for her achievements.
She is also recognized for her quote, "Don't let others put you down, let your faith rise you up high that they are ashamed."
